name: Utopian Skies
description:
A game project myself and game-racers (link below) began working on as a bit of a passion project. We finished most of the technical challenges before getting burnt out when it came time to actually implement the story. We took a break and both ended up moving on to different projects. I would love to continue this and I know they would too, so more updates in the future aren't out of the question.

As for the idea, the initial inspiration was to create a game, like cities skylines but with a twist. That twist isn't implemented or playable in the game just yet so I won't reveal it yet.

For now it's basically a glorified demo for the unity AI waypoint system and the assets game-racers made for the project that actually made it into the game!

https://game-racers.itch.io/

Controls

I - Next Line of Dialogue

E - Lock Camera in Place

WASD - Movement

Left Click - Place / Sell
